tool_description:
API to get political towns from a ZIP-code (Postleitzahl)
A ZIP-code can belong to multiple towns.
The data is updated daily.
name: Schweizer Postleitzahlen
title: Schweizer Postleitzahlen

api_list.name: getZIP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://schweizer-postleitzahlen.p.rapidapi.com/zip/3052"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "schweizer-postleitzahlen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://schweizer-postleitzahlen.p.rapidapi.com/zip/{zip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "schweizer-postleitzahlen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
